title: Creating User Profiles in mParticle
content:
To create and manage user profiles in mParticle:
                1. Implement identity management
                2. Set up user attributes
                3. Configure identity priority
                4. Define user identity mapping
                5. Enable cross-platform identity resolution
                
                Key concepts:
                - Customer IDs
                - Device IDs
                - User attributes
                - Identity resolution

title: Get Started
content:
[DOCS](/)

[DOCS](/)

  * [Home](/)
  * [Guides](/guides/)
  * [Developers](/developers/)
  * [Integrations](/integrations/)
  * [Changelog](https://changelog.mparticle.com)

[Sign Up](https://www.mparticle.com/free-trial)

mParticle is a customer data platform (CDP) that simplifies how you collect
and connect your user data to hundreds of vendors without needing to manage
multiple integrations. We simplify the entire process for you, so you can do
more with your data without the hassle of complex integrations.

New to mParticle? Explore our UI with our interactive demo.

Explore Demo

### Get Started

### 1\. Collect

Send your first event to mParticle

[Go to 'Create an input'](/guides/getting-started/create-an-input)

### 2\. Validate

Ensure data quality

[Go to 'Verify'](/guides/getting-started/start-capturing-data/#verify-look-
for-incoming-data-in-the-live-stream)

### 3\. Connect

Forward data to a downstream services

[Go to 'Connect an event output'](/guides/getting-started/connect-an-event-
output)

### Do more with mParticle

[

##### Identity

Manage user identities with IDSync

](/guides/idsync/introduction)

[

##### Data Master

View and enforce your data quality

](/guides/data-master/introduction)

[

##### Audiences

Engage customer cohorts

](/guides/personalization/audiences/overview)

[

##### Custom Rules

Transform data as it enters and leaves mParticle

](/guides/platform-guide/rules)

[

##### User Activity View

Get a complete view of your users

](/guides/platform-guide/activity/#user-activity)

[

##### User Privacy

Ensure compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and your privacy policies

](/guides/data-privacy-controls)

[

##### Events API

Send events directly to mParticle

](/developers/server/http)

[

##### Profile API

Real-time API to drive user personalization

](/developers/profile-api)

[

##### Firehose API

Build your own custom integrations

](/developers/partners/firehose)

[Sign Up](https://www.mparticle.com/free-trial)

# Guides

This section contains in-depth information about the mParticle platform and
features.

  * For information about our SDKs, APIs, and tools, visit the [Developers](/developers/) section.
  * For information about our latest product releases, visit the [mParticle Changelog](https://changelog.mparticle.com). 

[Platform Guide

](/guides/platform-guide/)

Learn to manage your data in the mParticle dashboard.

[Activity](/guides/platform-guide/activity/)[Connections](/guides/platform-
guide/connections/)[Data Filter](/guides/platform-guide/data-filter/)

[Learn More

](/guides/platform-guide/)

[Getting Started

](/guides/getting-started/)

A from-scratch guide to get you started sending data to mParticle and
forwarding it on to Event and Audience outputs.

[Create Inputs](/guides/getting-started/create-an-input/)[Start capturing
data](/guides/getting-started/start-capturing-data/)[Connect an Event
Output](/guides/getting-started/connect-an-event-output/)[Create an
Audience](/guides/getting-started/create-an-audience/)

[Learn More

](/guides/getting-started/)

[Analytics

](/guides/analytics/)

Uncover actionable insights across the entire customer journey without SQL or
writing a single line of code.

[Introduction](/guides/analytics/introduction/)[Settings](/guides/analytics/settings/)

[Learn More

](/guides/analytics/)

[IDSync

](/guides/idsync/)

Learn about mParticle’s premium Identity Management Framework

[Introduction](/guides/idsync/introduction/)[Use Cases for
IDSync](/guides/idsync/use-cases/)[Components of
IDSync](/guides/idsync/components/)

[Learn More

](/guides/idsync/)

[Data Master

](/guides/data-master/)

Explore every data point in your workspace and manage your data quality.

[Data Master Introduction](/guides/data-
master/introduction/)[Catalog](/guides/data-master/catalog/)[Live
Stream](/guides/data-master/live-stream/)[Data Plan](/guides/data-master/data-
planning/)

[Learn More

](/guides/data-master/)

[Personalization

](/guides/personalization/)

Create audiences and orchestrate customer journeys.

[Profiles](/guides/personalization/profiles/)[Calculated
Attributes](/guides/personalization/calculated-
attributes/)[Audiences](/guides/personalization/audiences/)[Journeys](/guides/personalization/journeys/)[Predictive
Audiences](/guides/personalization/predictive-audiences/)

[Learn More

](/guides/personalization/)

[Warehouse Sync

](/guides/data-warehouse-sync/)

Ingest data from third-party warehouses using mParticle's reverse-ETL
solution.

[Learn More

](/guides/data-warehouse-sync/)

[Data Privacy Controls

](/guides/data-privacy-controls/)

Collect and leverage consumer consent and opt-outs towards compliance with
GDPR and CCPA.

[Learn More

](/guides/data-privacy-controls/)

[Data Subject Requests

](/guides/data-subject-requests/)

Explore how to respond to data subject requests as mandated by the GDPR and
CCPA regulations.

[Learn More

](/guides/data-subject-requests/)

[Default Service Limits

](/guides/default-service-limits/)

Learn about the default limits mParticle imposes on incoming data in order to
protect the performance of the mParticle dashboard and your app.

[Learn More

](/guides/default-service-limits/)

[Feeds

](/guides/feeds/)

Harness third-party data sources with Feeds.

[Learn More

](/guides/feeds/)

[Cross-Account Audience Sharing

](/guides/cross-account-audience-sharing/)

Share audience data with other accounts within your organization.

[Learn More

](/guides/cross-account-audience-sharing/)

[Import Data with CSV Files

](/guides/csv/)

Import bulk data from a data warehouse or legacy system.

[Learn More

](/guides/csv/)

[Glossary

](/guides/glossary/)

List of mParticle-specific terms and definitions.

[Learn More

](/guides/glossary/)

[Video Index

](/guides/video-index/)

List of embedded videos.

[Learn More

](/guides/video-index/)

[Analytics (Deprecated)

](/guides/analytics-deprecated/)

Resources for legacy Analytics customers.

[Learn More

](/guides/analytics-deprecated/)

title: Developer Docs
content:
[DOCS](/)

[DOCS](/)

  * [Home](/)
  * [Guides](/guides/)
  * [Developers](/developers/)
  * [Integrations](/integrations/)
  * [Changelog](https://changelog.mparticle.com)

[Sign Up](https://www.mparticle.com/free-trial)

# Developer Docs

Shortcuts:

[JSON Reference](/developers/apis/json-reference/)[Events
API](/developers/apis/http/)[Web SDK](/developers/client-sdks/web/)[iOS
SDK](/developers/client-sdks/ios/)[Android SDK](/developers/client-
sdks/android/)

Use the mParticle SDKs and APIs to collect, organize, and manage customer
data.

### Quickstart

Pick a platform, and follow the SDK quickstart tutorial to see how easy it is
to collect data and forward it to a third-party integration.

[Android](/developers/quickstart/android/overview/)

[iOS](/developers/quickstart/ios/overview/)

[Web](/developers/quickstart/web/overview/)

### Learn about mParticle

From event tracking to predicting user behavior, the developer docs guide you
through each stage of building a complete mParticle implementation.

[Read the docs](/developers/developersjourney/)

## SDK

### Client SDK

Track and send customer data directly from your app to any server.

  * [Android](/developers/client-sdks/android/initialization/)
  * [iOS](/developers/client-sdks/ios/initialization/)
  * [Web](/developers/client-sdks/web/initialization/)
  * [Alexa](/developers/client-sdks/alexa/)
  * [AMP](/developers/client-sdks/amp/getting-started/)
  * [Cordova](/developers/client-sdks/cordova/getting-started/)
  * [Fire TV](/developers/client-sdks/android/initialization/)
  * [Flutter](/developers/client-sdks/flutter/getting-started/)
  * [React Native](/developers/client-sdks/react-native/getting-started/)
  * [Roku](/developers/client-sdks/roku/getting-started/)
  * [Unity](/developers/client-sdks/unity/getting-started/)
  * [Xbox](/developers/client-sdks/uwp/getting-started/)

### Server SDK

Track and send customer data between servers.

  * [Go](/developers/server-sdks/go/)
  * [Java](/developers/server-sdks/java/)
  * [Node](/developers/server-sdks/node/)
  * [Python](/developers/server-sdks/python/)
  * [Ruby](/developers/server-sdks/ruby/)

### Media SDK

Track media events and heartbeats across three platforms.

  * [Android](/developers/client-sdks/android/media/)
  * [iOS](/developers/client-sdks/ios/media/)
  * [Web](/developers/client-sdks/web/media/)

## API

### Events API

Collect data for contexts too complex for the Server SDK.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/http/)

### Bulk Profile Deletion API

Save time when improving data quality by deleting data associated with sets of
customers.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/bulk-profile-deletion-api/)

### Calculated Attributes API

Send seeds for your calculated attributes.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/ca-seeding-api/)

### Custom Access Roles API

Create and manage custom sets of permissions for your mParticle account users.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/custom-roles/)

### Data Planning API

Define your data schema with Data Master.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/dataplanning-api/)

### Data Subject Request API

Submit data subject requests for GDPR and CCPA compliance via the OpenDSR API.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/dsr-api/v3/)

### ID Sync API

Match and resolve identities to build a single user profile for all user
activities.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/idsync/)

### Platform API

Programmatically update your mParticle inputs, outputs, filters, and more.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/platform/)

### Pixel Service API

Send data to mParticle from your web site via a tracking pixel.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/pixel-service/)

### Profile API

Access user profiles at scale to power personalized experiences.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/profile-api/)

### Group Identity API

Create groups of users based on shared attributes.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/group-identity-api/)

### Warehouse Sync API

Go beyond Reverse-ETL and build a headless data infrastructure.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/warehouse-sync-api/overview/)

## Tools

### mParticle CLI

Access some mParticle features from a terminal.

[Learn more](/developers/tools/cli/)

### Smartype

Manage your data plans as code.

[Learn more](/developers/tools/smartype/)

### Smartype Linting

Lint your code against your data plan.

[Learn more](/developers/tools/linting/)

## More Guides

### Data Hosting

Understand how to reference the pod where your org is hosted.

[Learn more](/developers/guides/data-localization/)

### ComposeID

Use IDSync to identify unknown users with data stored in Snowflake.

[Learn more](/developers/apis/warehouse-sync-api/idsync/)

### Glossary

List of mParticle-specific terms.

[Learn more](/guides/glossary/)

### Partners

Become an mParticle partner and make your platform available for input or
output.

[Learn more](/developers/guides/partners/introduction/)

### Rules

Cleanse and transform data before it is output to another system.

[Learn more](/developers/guides/rules/)

### Segment Migration

Migrate your Segment implementation to mParticle.

[Learn more](/developers/guides/migration-segment/overview/)

[DOCS](/)Last Updated: 28/02/2025, 01:15:31

  * [Home](/)
  * [Guides](/guides/)
  * [Developers](/developers/)
  * [Integrations](/integrations/)

  * [Overview](https://support.mparticle.com/hc/en-us/categories/11229701873421)

  * [Developers](https://support.mparticle.com/hc/en-us/categories/11229725035533)
  * [Expert Training](https://support.mparticle.com/hc/en-us/categories/11229720711693)

### Predictive AI

  * [Cortex Docs](https://www.vidora.com/docs/)
  * [Overview](https://www.vidora.com/docs/?top-category=overview)
  * [Getting Started](https://www.vidora.com/docs/?top-category=getting-started)
  * [Developers](https://www.vidora.com/docs/?top-category=developer-docs)
  * [Using Cortex](https://www.vidora.com/docs/?top-category=using-cortex)

### Learn More

  * [Blog](https://www.mparticle.com/blog/)
  * [Podcast](https://www.mparticle.com/connected-podcast/)
  * [Resources](https://www.mparticle.com/resources/)
  * [Community](https://www.reddit.com/r/mparticle/)
  * [Change log](https://changelog.mparticle.com/en)

### Get in Touch

  * [Help Center](https://support.mparticle.com/hc/en-us)
  * [Demo](https://demo.mparticle.com/activity/app)
  * [Become a Partner](https://www.mparticle.com/partner/)
